channel.title: I disconnect right when i connect
channel.description: I haven't coded servers in about 2 years but i figured i'd get back to it. So i have no-ip, uttorent/bittorent and my server. I can log on with any client but after it shows the login-text i'll disconnect. I tried it with another server source and it did the same thing. The usernames not banned and the ip's not banned either. When i look at the 'runserver' code window it'll show that i connected but then logged out. Can someone help me?

item.title: I disconnect right when i connect
item.dc:creator: @GDXChris GDXChris
item.description:
@GDXChris wrote:

Describe it a little more. Does it log you out when you go past the login screen into the black “Loading - Please Wait…” screen? If so, its a client compatibility problem.

Read full topic
item.source: I disconnect right when i connect

item.title: I disconnect right when i connect
item.dc:creator: @str8golden str8golden
item.description:
@str8golden wrote:

lol reopen ur ports and repath. go 2 gui.java or client.java w/e source u have make sure its connecting 2 12.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 or your no ip

Read full topic
